feed.title: Microjs
feed.subtitle: Fantastic Micro-Frameworks and Micro-Libraries for Fun and Profit!

entry.title: Simplify.js
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:50:58Z A tiny high-performance JavaScript 2D/3D polyline simplification library.

entry.title: microevent.js
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:50:58Z event emitter for any javascript object for node and browser.

entry.title: Minion
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:50:58Z Cross-platform & cross-browser classical inheritance in JavaScript

entry.title: cssFx
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:50:58Z Standalone polyfill that inserts the vendor-specific CSS3 properties necessary for old and new browsers.

entry.title: Panzer
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:50:58Z A comprehensive node-tree solution, for smart data

entry.title: microcache.js
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:55:32Z in-memory cache for node and browser.

entry.title: TinyDOM
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:55:32Z A very small DOM manipulation framework

entry.title: one-color
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:55:32Z Browser/node color library. Implicit color space conversions, chainable channel methods and CSS convenience methods. RGB, HSV, HSL, CMYK with alpha channel

entry.title: tinyJS
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A tiny yet complete toolkit

entry.title: BuildSugar
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Bizarrely clean & simple syntax sugar for building HTML/XML strings

entry.title: Lawnchair
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Client side JSON document store. Perfect for WebKit mobile apps.

entry.title: mathmethods.js
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Give `Number.prototype` the `Math` methods it deserves.

entry.title: Base64.js
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z `window.btoa` and `window.atob` for browsers which don't provide these functions.

entry.title: String::format
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Adds a `format` method to `String.prototype`. Inspired by Python's `str.format()`.

entry.title: Firmin
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Animation library that uses CSS transforms and transitions to create smooth, hardware-accelerated animations.

entry.title: Ekho
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z DOM-agnostic event library, with bubbling.

entry.title: Bootstrap
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A small, simple bootloader. No frills. Black and white label.

entry.title: Micro-Templating
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Templating function that is fast, caches quickly, and is easy to use.

entry.title: xui
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z DOM library for authoring HTML5 mobile web applications, works cross-device and cross-platform.

entry.title: JSONSelect
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z CSS-like selectors for JSON.

entry.title: gowiththeflow.js
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Async flow control micro library for node and browser.

entry.title: Underscore
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A utility-belt that provides functional programming support that you would expect in Ruby.

entry.title: DOMBrew
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Clean API high performance DOM builder

entry.title: Slang
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A collection of utility functions for strings

entry.title: Backbone
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Lightweight MVC—models with custom events, collections with rich enumerables, views and RESTful JSON.

entry.title: genData
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A normalization pattern to build, query, and manipulate everything.

entry.title: MinPubSub
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A publish/subscribe messaging framework

entry.title: Morf
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A JavaScript work-around for hardware accelerated CSS3 transitions with custom easing functions.

entry.title: $dom
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Selecting, styling, traversing and animating DOM elements.

entry.title: Modernizr
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Detects native CSS3 and HTML5 features available in the current browser.

entry.title: Zepto
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z jQuery API-compatible framework for modern web browsers. Optional Ajax, Events, Data and Touch modules.

entry.title: Weld
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Completely unobtrusive, full featured template antimatter. Works in Node.js or the Browser, awesome built-in debugger.

entry.title: Mustache
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Minimal, logic-less templating with {{mustaches}}. Great for server- or client-side templating.

entry.title: LABjs
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z The *performance* script loader: on-demand parallel script loading with ordered execution for dependencies.

entry.title: Qwery
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Blazing fast query selector engine allowing you to select elements with CSS1, CSS2 & CSS3 selectors.

entry.title: Jaguar
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A lightweight, extensible, and fast selector engine with excellent support for matchesSelector(), commonly used in event delegation. Jaguar supports all CSS1, CSS2, and most CSS3 selectors.

entry.title: Bean
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Bean is a slick, cross-platform, framework-agnostic event utility designed for desktop, mobile, and touch-based browsers.

entry.title: $script.js
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z An asynchronous JavaScript loader and dependency manager with an astonishingly impressive footprint.

entry.title: Klass
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z An expressive, cross platform JavaScript Class provider with a slick, classical interface to prototypal inheritance.

entry.title: Bonzo
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Hassle-free, library agnostic, extensible DOM utility.

entry.title: Classy
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Classy is a small JavaScript library that implements Python inspired classes for JavaScript.

entry.title: Director
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A lightweight, full featured client side router for single page apps.

entry.title: Reqwest
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Robust wrapper for asynchronous http requests.

entry.title: Ender
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z An open, powerful, micro-to-macro API for composing your own custom JavaScript library.

entry.title: Tempo
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Tempo is a JSON rendering engine that enables you to craft data templates in pure HTML.

entry.title: scaleApp.js
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z scaleApp is a tiny JavaScript framework for scalable one-page-applications

entry.title: Q
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z when/defer-style promises for JavaScript (CommonJS/Promises/A,B,D)

entry.title: ICanHaz
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Simple & powerful client-side templating for jQuery or Zepto.js.

entry.title: snack.js
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A tiny, cross-browser, library with DOM manipulation, events, pub/sub, Ajax and language utilities.

entry.title: Milk

entry.title: domReady
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Lets you know when the DOM is ready

entry.title: JSON2
entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Creates a JSON property in the global object, if there isn't already one, with stringify and parse methods.

entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Cross Browser caching util leveraging LocalStorage and XML Store with a Memcached interface

entry.title: yepnope

entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A library for functional operations

entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z A functional object operations library.

entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z CommonJS implementation of the observer design pattern

entry.title: H5F.js

entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z JavaScripts functional sister providing iterators, type checking, and basic utils

entry.title: jWorkflow

entry.updated: 2012-02-16'T'00:59:56Z Evented JavaScript for the browser
